summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 FORD FUSION. WHILE DRIVING 25 MPH, THE POWER STEERING SEIZED WITHOUT WARNING. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO SUNSET FORD (LOCATED AT 11700 GRAVOIS ROAD, ST. LOUIS, MO 63127, TEL: (314) 843-4431) TO BE DIAGNOSED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED AT THE TIME OF THE COMPLAINT. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE, BUT DID NOT ASSIST. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 28,000.
